DOC.brief_summary: The overall goal study determine whether Walk Ease ( WWE ) program 2 version ( group-assisted self-directed ) increase physical activity fitness level among individual ( 18 year old ) arthritis long-term . Participants approximately 657 subject 20-24 rural urban community across North Carolina . It expect participant WWE program reduce pain , improve function increase activity level participation 6-week program .
DOC.criteria: Selfreported , doctordiagnosed arthritis Ages 18+ NonEnglish speaking Severe impairment physical mental function Coexisting condition exercise contraindicate
